title: Vintner Kathryn Hall on Hall Wines' Platinum Collection (Audio)
itunes:title: Vintner Kathryn Hall on Hall Wines' Platinum Collection (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: LUXURY: Kathryn Hall, Owner of Hall Wines in Napa Valley --and former United States Ambassador to Austria-- on their new luxury Platinum collection and her new book.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
